backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with access control, user profile management, and comprehensive types for characters, worldbuilding, prologues, and book projects.
backend/migration.mo: Provides type definitions mirroring backend state and a no-op migration function returning the previous actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their roles in the app.
frontend/DRAFT_BUILD.md: Instructions for building and testing the draft multi-character family questionnaire feature.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles and color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling auth flow, workspace navigation, and opening the book setup questionnaire.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Renders the application header with branding and optional workspace controls.
frontend/src/components/bookSetup/BookSe: Multi‑step dialog for answering book setup questions, renaming the project, and saving structured answers.
frontend/src/components/bookSetup/bookSe: Defines the list of book setup questions, options, and metadata for character, worldbuilding, and prologue setup.
frontend/src/components/characters/BandQ: Manages per-member band questionnaire navigation and input handling, supporting text, textarea, radio options, and custom inputs.
frontend/src/components/characters/bandQ: Defines question banks for creating a band/group, including group-level and per-member questionnaire items.
Generates character text fields for band members using their questionnaire answers and group-wide details.
frontend/src/components/characters/Chara: Displays up to 150 character slots with filled or empty cards and triggers selection actions.
Provides a form for creating or editing a character with accordion sections and submits data via API hooks.
Guides users through multi‑module character questionnaires with progress saving, previewing, and final character creation.
frontend/src/components/characters/chara: Builds a full character profile by combining module answers and custom inputs into narrative sections.
Provides TypeScript types for questionnaire structures, questions, answers, and progress state.
Defines the core character questionnaire module with identity and family background questions.
Exports a list of all questionnaire modules, including core, personality, and style.
Defines the personality questionnaire module with multiple radio-based questions covering communication, conflict, decision-making, trust, humor, emotions, social energy, and responses to change.
Creates the style questionnaire module with questions about fashion, colors, accessories, grooming, body language, voice tone, speech patterns, and living space.
frontend/src/components/characters/Chara: Renders a character’s major narrative sections in a card-based summary layout.
frontend/src/components/characters/Creat: Multi-step wizard for creating a band, collecting group info and individual member details, then generating multiple characters.
frontend/src/components/characters/Famil: Handles sequential family questionnaire questions with radio, checkbox, and custom input logic, advancing across people.
frontend/src/components/characters/famil: Provides typed family questionnaire question definitions, sections, and options for background, identity, traits, relationships, goals, and other character attributes.
Generates deterministic narrative text for a character using questionnaire answers, producing background, motivations, relationships, flaws, voice, and story-role sections.
Defines TypeScript types for storing family questionnaire answers, including value formats, custom inputs, and metadata for each person.
frontend/src/components/characters/Multi: React dialog wizard for creating multiple characters, managing steps, person entries, main character selection, and questionnaire data updates.
frontend/src/components/characters/multi: Declares types and constants for multi-character questionnaires, including family roles, gender options, person drafts, and questionnaire state.
frontend/src/components/ExportProjectBut: Button that exports the currently selected project and shows toast notifications.
Provides UI for creating, selecting, renaming, and deleting projects, with optional questionnaire launch.
frontend/src/components/prologue/Prologu: Implements an editor UI for creating and saving prologue sections with form fields, accordions, and project-linked persistence.
Renders a read-only outline of a prologue, showing sections like hook, POV, stakes, key reveals, and the optional full draft.
frontend/src/components/WorkspaceMenu.ts: Dropdown workspace menu for navigating sections, selecting genres, managing custom categories, and logging out.
frontend/src/components/worldbuilding/Wo: Component for editing a worldbuilding category’s description and adding notes using project-specific mutations.
frontend/src/config/workspaceMenuItems.t: Defines workspace menu item types and a list of genre and tool menu entries with icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating project, character, and worldbuilding data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom light/dark theme variables and typography settings.
frontend/src/lib/exportProject.ts: Generates a Markdown export of a project’s characters, worldbuilding, and prologue, then triggers a file download.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, identity provider, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/sections/CharactersPage.tsx: Renders the character hub with slot interactions and dialogs for creating, editing, and grouping characters. Manages various UI states for questionnaires and character selection.
frontend/src/sections/ProloguePage.tsx: Provides an editor and outline view for the project's prologue using tabbed navigation within a card layout.
Displays expandable worldbuilding categories and editors populated from the current project's data. Uses an accordion to manage category sections and their prompts.
frontend/src/state/useProjects.ts: Manages project selection, persistence, and retrieval using query hooks and localStorage. Auto-selects a project and clears invalid selections.
frontend/src/state/useWorkspaceCategorie: Handles built‑in and custom workspace categories with localStorage persistence. Supports adding, removing, and querying category metadata.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/src/views/HomeView.tsx: Landing page with branding, a brief app description, and sign‑up/login buttons. Encourages users to begin creating stories.
frontend/src/views/LoginView.tsx: Login form using Internet Identity with loading, error handling, and back navigation. Wraps login flow in a card layout.
frontend/src/views/SignUpView.tsx: Sign‑up view using Internet Identity with error handling and a similar layout to login. Initiates account creation via the same login hook.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom theme extensions, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project state, including feature requirements for a new band/group questionnaire flow and expanded member limits.
